module.name: date_time_assignment
module.purpose: The Date time assignment application module supports the requirement to assign a date or a date and a time with a role to activity or product data.

inscope.li: the assignment of a date with a role to activity or product data;
the assignment of a date and time with a role to activity or product data.

uof.name: Date_time_assignment
uof.description: The Date_time_assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of assigning date or date and time with a role to activity or product data.

ae.alt: #1 : for assigned dates that are instances of Calendar_date #2 : for assigned dates that are instances of Date_time

aa.refpath: #1: (date_assignment date_assignment.assigned_date -> date {date => calendar_date}) #2: (date_and_time_assignment date_and_time_assignment.assigned_date_and_time -> date_and_time {date_and_time.date_component -> date => calendar_date} {date_and_time.time_component ->local_time})

aa.alt: #1 : if assigned dates are instances of Calendar_date #2 : if assigned dates are instances of Date_time
aa.refpath: #1: (date_assignment date_assignment.role -> date_role date_role.name) #2: (date_and_time_assignment date_and_time_assignment.role -> date_time_role date_time_role.name)
